# function created in order to create plots for each protein
```{r}
proteinplot <- function(x){
  s <- read.pdb(x)
  s.chainA <- trim.pdb(s, chain = "A", elety = "CA")
  s.b <-  s.chainA$atom$b
    plotb3(s.b, sse=s.chainA, typ="l", ylab="Bfactor")
}
```

```{r}
proteinplot("4AKE")
proteinplot("1AKE")
proteinplot("1E4Y")

```
